1230:6: asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ vāhya meva vivakṣitaṃ;
1230:8: yadi vā apohanaṃ apoha ityanya vyāvṛttimātraṃ iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ|
1230:12: tathāhi parvvatoddeśe vanhirastīti śābdau pratītirvvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate;
1230:14: yacca pratyakṣavādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśa ityatiprasiddham|
1230:15: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ|
1230:18: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇāt vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām;
1230:22: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt,
1230:24: anyathā'sati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākārepi cetasi turagabodha ityastu|
1230:26: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśā kārovikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu,
1230:28: tadā ca satopi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt;
1230:41: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam;
1230:42: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyāt anyāpoḍhovadhāryyate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam|
1230:45: na hi vidhiṃ pratīpadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati;
1230:51: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpala pratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryyam;
1230:52: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitāt go-pratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt ago[']pohasphuraṇamanivāryyam|
1230:56: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ;
1230:62: tāsāñca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityarthatastadavagaterna gāmbadhāneti co dito'śvādīn badhnāti|
1230:63: tadapyanenaiva nirastaṃ yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyavyāvṛttameva cet,
1230:67: vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthatopi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam|
1230:73: na hi sāmānyaṃ nāma sāmānyamātramabhipretam turagepi gośabdasaṅketaprasaṅgāt|
1230:78: tasmāt ekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvvako yaḥ sarvvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiradhya sto vikalpabudhyākāraḥ,
1230:86: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva;
1230:90: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthāeveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt tasmādapohadharmmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ;
1230:105: indriyaśabdasvabhāvopāyabhedāt ekasyaiva pratibhāsa bheda iti cet?
1230:109: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruḍdhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ;
1230:115: dūrāsannadeśavarttinoḥ puruṣayoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhedepi na śākhibheda iti cet ?
1230:118: tato yatrārthakriyābhedādisacivaḥ pratibhāsabhedaḥ tatra vastubhedaḥ, ghaṭavat|
1230:121: na ca śabdapratyakṣayovvastugocaratve pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteriti|
1230:125: tanna śābde pratyaye svalakṣaṇam parisphurati kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvvātmanā pratipatteḥ,
1230:131: tasmāt śabdapratibhāsasya vāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate|
1230:132: yacca vācaspatinā jātimabdyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastu tyānanantarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate;
1230:133: sā hi svarūpato nityāpi deśakālaviprakīrṇānekavyaktyāśrayatayā bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇībhavannastinā stisambandhayogyā;
1230:137: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇāvācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt|
1230:151: yacceḍhaṃ na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāṃ arthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt;
1230:152: vicitraśaktitvāt pramāṇānāmiti tadapyaindriyakaśābdapratibhāsayorekasvarūpagrāhitve bhinnāvabhāsadūṣaṇena dūṣitam vicitraśaktitvañca pramāṇānāṃ sākṣātkārādhyavasāyābhyāmapi caritārtham|
1230:153: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt;
1230:155: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet?
1230:160: vikalpastu svayanniścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa?
1230:161: asti ca śabdaliṅgāntarāpekṣā tato na vastu svarūpagrahaḥ|
1230:162: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmmadvāreṇa pratītepi śākhini dharmmāntaravattayā na pratītiriti kinna bhinnā bhidhānādhī no dharmāntarasya nīlacaloccaistaratvāderavavodhaḥ|
1230:165: dṛśyasya dharmmadharmmibhedasya pratyakṣapratikṣiptatvā danyathā sarvvaṃ sarvvatra syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ|
1230:170: tathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādi sambandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmmipratipattau niravaśeṣataḍvarmmapratipatti rbhavet;
1230:176: natūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti|
1230:180: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmmadharmmiṇoḥ pratiniyamakalpanamucitam|
1230:184: tadabhiprāyānavagāhana phalam tathā hi tvanmate dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedaḥ upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattiḥ|
1230:186: tat kathaṃ sūryyo pakāryyasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ|
1230:189: asti ca, tasmānna svalakṣaṇasya śabdavikalpaliṅgapratibhāsitvamiti sthitam||
1230:191: saritaḥ pāre gāvaścarantīti gavādiśabdāt sāsrāśṛṅgalāṅgūlādayo'kṣarākāraparikaritāḥ sajātīyabhedāparāmarśanāt sampiṇḍitaprāyāḥ pratibhāsante|
1230:198: vyaktaya eva vā sajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantā manubhavavyavadhānāt;
1230:209: yadāpi piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet;
1230:213: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvam syāt|
1230:214: tasmāt kāraṇaparamparāta eva gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā|
1230:217: atha bhinnaṃ tadā tadeva sāmānyam nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet ?
1230:219: yathātvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ tatha anyopi bhavan kīdṛśandoṣamāvahati ?
1230:220: yathā bhavatāṃ jātirekāpi samānadhvaniprasavaheturanyāpi svarūpeṇaiva jātyantaranirapekṣā|
1230:221: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ|
1230:223: aśvatvagotvā dīnāṃ sāmānya viśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyam;
1230:232: etena yeyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīsu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyuhāpravarttanamasya pratyākhyātam|
1230:239: tulya bhede yayā jā tiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati|
1230:242: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu kiṃ daṇḍasūtrādineti|
1230:246: tadyadīdaṃ parikalpanīyam tadā varam pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām,
1230:264: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimā n piṇḍa iti parikalpitam bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādgovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya|
1230:271: tatra na budhyākārasya tattvataḥ sambṛttyā vā vidhiniṣedhau|
1230:274: nāpi tattvato vāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau tasya śābde pratyaye'pratibhāsanāt|
1230:275: ataeva sarvvadharmmāṇāntattvato'nabhilāpyatvaṃ pratibhāsādhyavasāyābhāvāt tasmāt vāhyasyaiva sāmbṛtau vidhiniṣedhau|
1230:278: vahireva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ||
1230:282: nanvadhyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko'rthaḥ ?
1230:285: ucyate; yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā niyataśaktitvāt niyatā eva jalādau pravṛttiḥ|
1230:290: yenākāre vāhyasya vāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ|
1230:291: kintarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buḍvirapaśyantyapi vāhyaṃ vāhye vṛttimātano tīti viplutaiva|
1230:293: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam||
1230:312: viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānam vācakatvamadhyavasitavāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ|
